text: Lalit Navinchandra Morzaria, aged 48 years, is one of our Promoters and Whole-Time Director of our Company. For the complete profile of Lalit Navinchandra Morzaria along with details of his educational qualifications, personal address, professional experience, positions / posts held in the past, directorship held, business and other financial activities, see "*Our Management*" beginning on page 226 of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.

*Our Company confirms that the details of the PAN, bank Account numbers, Aadhar card numbers, driving license numbers and passport numbers of our Promoters shall be submitted to the Stock Exchange(s) at the time of filing of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.*
## Change in control of our Company

Our Promoters are the original Promoters of our Company. There has not been any change in control of our Company in the five years immediately preceding the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus. However, pursuant to a resolution dated December 5, 2024 passed by the Board of Directors, Arvind Chhotalal Morzaria, Dilip Chhotalal Morzaria, Subhash Chhotalal Morzaria, Lalit Navinchandra Morzaria, Meet Arvind Morzaria, Smeet Morzaria and Anand Dilip Morzaria have been identified as Promoters.
